COURSES INCLUDE

FOUNDATION

A Solar Foundations Course built to match the learning objectives of NABCEP's Associate exam. Heavy with fundamental content, this video course will provide a critical foundation for first time learners, exam preppers and even seasoned vets.

OPERATIONS

Our cornerstone course enables professionals to learn PV system operations through a series of videos and troubleshooting simulation challenges. Ideal for installers who want a real understanding of system performance, not just step-by-step installation procedure.

SALES

Sales is the engine driving every company. Invest in company sales skills by giving employees access to a Consultative Sales Program that will *Up their Win Percentage* and help your company grow faster.

SOLAR ELECTRICITY & SIM

Electricity fundamentals and specifics components related to PV are paramount to installing PV safely and effectively. This course uses a simulation to help visualize very difficult concepts and bring electricity to life.

SITE SURVEY & SIM

To effectively start completing full site surveys or qualifying a lead on site, employees must understand many aspects of survey. This simulation-based course progress employees through many components of site survey.

MANUFACTURING UNIVERSITY
